participant_1.background: i've a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.

participant_2.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i dye my hair every three months. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood.

content.text: Hi, I'm Janie, my hair is red but tomorrow it will be blue
hi how are you doing? i just got done hiking.
an outside person. I'm the opposite, I've been playing role games all day
what is your role? i am a girl.
ha, for a while I thought it was veterinarian, even went to vet school.
i am not sure what that is. i do like animals though.
well, animal doctor, but I faint at the sight of blood, so bad choice
do you have any pets? mine is orange.
an orange pet? and orange utan, haha? nope, no pets here
what do you do for fun? i like hiking.
I spend most of my time on the internet, it's a bit of an addiction
do you like to hike? i love the outdoors.
no, ideally I'd even work from home, so I don't have to go outside at all
do you work from home? do you live in the city?
